scripts.prebuild: mkdir -p lib && for f in $(find src/ -iname *.js | cut -c5-) ; do cp src/$f lib/$f.flow; done
flow-check.README: to run flow continuously use the following incantation from the shell:
$ npm run flow-check && npm run watch -n 0.5 -t -d npm run flow-check-drft
... the above incantation will install the flow-typed definitions only the
first time and then continuously invoke flow *without* re-installing the said definitions
scripts.test: npm run build && mocha --require source-map-support/register --compilers js:babel-register
scripts.test-watch: npm run build && mocha --require source-map-support/register --compilers js:babel-register --watch
scripts.preglobalInstallOnThisMachine: npm run clean && npm run flow-check && npm run test
scripts.prepublish: (in-publish && npm run clean && npm run flow-check && npm run test) || not-in-publish
